#### Μπαϊντούσκα (Baidouska)



Each bar has a short beat and a long beat (5/8 time). The dance is in 10 bars , with two steps per bar:





  * 4 bars: Starting on the right foot, run/skip to the right right


  * 3 bars: Cross the right foot in front of the left


  * 3 bars: Kick with the right foot, kick with the left foot, then stomp on the right foot



A slow [video introduction](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qQTrAD9E04Y)

[Classic song](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kkjiWI68W2Q); and on [Google play](https://play.google.com/music/m/Tdeb556cgiuvaqajqh56b36y5nq?t=Baidouska_Thrace_-_Greek_Folk_Orchestra) (very slow)

[Κάτω στο ροίδο](https://youtu.be/UplGG7NgUak?t=23) ([στίχοι 1](http://www.stixoi.info/stixoi.php?info=Lyrics&act=details&song_id=51114), [στίχοι 2](http://www.stixoi.info/stixoi.php?info=Lyrics&act=details&song_id=32997))

**Ζωναράδικος**

Each bar has six beats (6/8).





  * 1, 2, 3: Step right, cross in front, step again


  * 4: Start moving left foot backwards


  * 5: Left foot lands


  * 6: Lift right foot
